item.title: Oliver Mander: At The Warehouse, there's even more change in store
item.description: The Warehouse Group has been transforming New Zealand retailing ever since its launch on the North Shore by Stephen Tindall in 1982. Nearly every New Zealander will have passed through its stores at one ...

enclosure.url: https://media.nzherald.co.nz/webcontent/image/jpg/202030/SCCZEN_A_HBT18073216_70x72.jpg?media_subtype_id=16|caption=Retailer's reforms are driving good results, but it must keep investing in change, writes Oliver Mander. Photo / Paul Taylor
